import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';// Styles for add chat component
var addChatStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{chatNameInput:{marginBottom:theme.spacing(4)},datePicker:{width:250,marginBottom:theme.spacing(2)},fab:{position:'fixed',bottom:theme.spacing(5),right:theme.spacing(5),textTransform:'none'},extendedIcon:{marginRight:theme.spacing(1)}};});export default addChatStyles;
